I usually call it crowd karaoke. The whole crowd sings things together, and it's a dance party on top of that. The visuals are all in 3D, so you can stand at the back and just watch the movie that's playing on the screen. I cut up all these movies and I write the music to sync up to the movies that show in the background. The shows have certainly helped with the buzz building around Rich Aucoin ; recently, a misinterpreted Facebook update started a rumour that he would be performing on the Late Show with David Letterman .
